name: User is able to configure and trigger periodic builds as scheduled.
description: A User can enable the "Build periodically trigger" in a Freestyle project and that the build runs according to the specified schedule.
descriptionHtml: A User can enable the "Build periodically trigger" in a Freestyle project and that the build runs according to the specified schedule.

beforeStages.name: Configure WebDriver with options and save failure screenshot.
Launch browser and open the Login Page.
Log in with valid credentials and open the Jenkins Main Page.

steps.name: Login with credentials
Fetch and update Jenkins CSRF crumb token.
Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='', current_username='admin'))

beforeStages.name: Navigate to the New Item Page.

steps.name: Go to the New Item Page by clicking New Item button.
Navigate to "NewItemPage"
Create new freestyle project with the name "'New Freestyle Project'".
Input project name "New Freestyle Project".
Select "Freestyle project" type.
Click "OK" button.
Go to the Freestyle Project Configuration page.

steps.name: Enable 'Build periodically' and set cron schedule"'*/1 * * * *'".
Check "Build periodically" checkbox.
Enter cron schedule '*/1 * * * *' into the Schedule field
Save configurations.
Click Save Button and go to the Freestyle Project Page.
Wait up to 60 seconds for the build to appear in the build history.
